snippet: Four masked guards pinned former President Hissène Habré to a chair in the courtroom in Senegal where he is being tried.
abstract: Former Chad Pres Hissene Habre is dragged into special war crimes court in Senegal by masked guards; scene of Habre struggling with guards is streamed live on Internet.
lead_paragraph: Four masked guards pinned former President Hissène Habré to a chair in the courtroom in Senegal where he is being tried.

headline.main: Former Leader of Chad Hauled Into Court as Trial Resumes
headline.print_headline: Guards Drag Ex-President of Chad Into Court

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
